616260.name: Fantasy Grounds - H1-Castle of Shadows 4E Fantasy (Token Pack)
616260.description:
H1-Castle of Shadows

4E Fantasy Token Pack
This product is an installable module containing tokens for use with the Fantasy
Ground II virtual tabletop. Upon activating the module, the tokens will appear in
your Token box for use throughout your game. They have been organized by genre and
product name to make it easy to use multiple token pack modules within your game.
Tokens are scaled and organized in the following sizes for medium creatures: 32x32,
50x50, 75x75 and 100x100 pixels. This allows you to use the token quality that best
meets your needs.
This pack contains tokens for the following characters:
  • blue slime (large)
  • clay scout (small)
  • corruption corpse (medium)
  • dark creeper (small)
  • elf archer
  • gelatinous cube (large)
  • ghoul (medium)
  • gnome (small)
  • goblin crazy (small)
  • goblin cutter (small)
  • goblin fat (small)
  • goblin sharpshooter (small)
  • goblin warrior (small)
  • guard drake (small)
  • halfling slinger (small)
  • hobgoblin archer (medium)
  • hobgoblin grunt (medium)
  • hobgoblin soldier (medium)
  • hobgoblin torturer (medium)
  • hobgoblin warcaster (medium)
  • hobgoblin warchief (medium)
  • human berserker (medium)
  • human rabble (medium)
  • kobold dragonshield (small)
  • kobold minion (small)
  • kobold skirmisher (small)
  • kobold slinger (small)
  • kobold wyrmpriest (small)
  • kruthik adult (medium)
  • kruthik hatchling (small)
  • kruthik young (small)
  • ochre jelly (large)
  • orcus priest (medium)
  • orcus underpriest (medium)
  • pregen dragonborn paladin
  • pregen dwarf fighter
  • pregen halfelf cleric
  • pregen halfling rogue
  • pregen human wizard
  • pregen tiefling warlord
  • rat giant (small)
  • rat swarm
  • skeleton decrepit (medium)
  • skeleton knight (medium)
  • skeleton warrior (medium)
  • spider deathjump (medium)
  • vampire spawn (medium)
  • wight deathlock
  • zombie gravehound (medium)
  • zombie (medium)
  • zombie rotter (medium)
Fantasy Grounds II Conversion: Doug Davison
Ruleset Compatibility: Any
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Doug Davison
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
